name: Just a memory
description:
My second idea for the minijam 54 with theme "memories". I didn't manage to complete this on time, so publish it  post jam.

Credits:
Music: https://opengameart.org/content/emotional-piano-loop
Sun (recoloured): https://opengameart.org/content/shiny-sun
Tiles: https://opengameart.org/content/simple-tileset-assets
Character sprite: https://opengameart.org/content/18x20-characters-walkattackcast-spritesheet

You can read the poem here.
